verses.verse: Now it happened when Adoni-Zedek <S%H139><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> how <S%H3588><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> had taken <S%H3920><s%> Ai, <S%H5857><s%> and had utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> it; <S%H6213><s%> as he had done to Jericho <S%H3405><s%> and her king, <S%H4428><s%> so he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Ai <S%H5857><s%> and her king; <S%H4428><s%> and how the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> had made peace <S%H7999><s%> with Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and were among them; <S%H7130><s%>

that they were very <S%H3966><s%> afraid, <S%H3372><s%> because Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> was a great <S%H1419><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> of the royal <S%H4467><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> and because it was greater <S%H1419><s%> than Ai, <S%H5857><s%> and all its men <S%H582><s%> were mighty. <S%H1368><s%>

Therefore Adoni-Zedek <S%H139><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to Hoham <S%H1944><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> to Piram <S%H6502><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Jarmuth, <S%H3412><s%> to Japhia <S%H3309><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Lachish, <S%H3923><s%> and to Debir <S%H1688><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Eglon, <S%H5700><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Come up <S%H5927><s%> to me, <S%H5826><s%> and help me, <S%H5221><s%> and let us strike Gibeon; <S%H1391><s%> for it has made peace <S%H7999><s%> with Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"

Therefore the five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jarmuth, <S%H3412><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Lachish, <S%H3923><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Eglon, <S%H5700><s%> gathered themselves together, <S%H622><s%> and went up, <S%H5927><s%> they and all their armies, <S%H4264><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> against Gibeon, <S%H1391><s%> and made war against it. <S%H3898><s%>

The men <S%H582><s%> of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> to the camp <S%H4264><s%> to Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Don't <S%H3027><s%> abandon <S%H7503><s%> your servants! <S%H5650><s%> Come up <S%H5927><s%> to us quickly, <S%H4120><s%> and save <S%H3467><s%> us, <S%H5826><s%> and help us; <S%H4428><s%> for all the kings of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the hill country <S%H2022><s%> have gathered together against us. <S%H6908><s%>"

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> from Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> he, <S%H5971><s%> and all the people of war <S%H4421><s%> with him, <S%H1368><s%> and all the mighty men of valor. <S%H2428><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "Don't <S%H3372><s%> fear them, <S%H5414><s%> for I have delivered them into your hands. <S%H3027><s%> Not a man <S%H376><s%> of them will stand <S%H5975><s%> before you. <S%H6440><s%>"
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> therefore came <S%H935><s%> on them suddenly. <S%H6597><s%> He went up <S%H5927><s%> from Gilgal <S%H1537><s%> all night. <S%H3915><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> confused <S%H2000><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and he killed <S%H5221><s%> them with a great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter <S%H4347><s%> at Gibeon, <S%H1391><s%> and chased <S%H7291><s%> them by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the ascent <S%H4608><s%> of Beth Horon, <S%H1032><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> them to Azekah <S%H5825><s%> and to Makkedah. <S%H4719><s%>

It happened, <S%H5127><s%> as they fled from before <S%H6440><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> while they were at the descent <S%H4174><s%> of Beth Horon, <S%H1032><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> cast down <S%H4174><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> from the sky <S%H8064><s%> on them to Azekah, <S%H5825><s%> and they died. <S%H4191><s%> There were more <S%H7227><s%> who died <S%H4191><s%> from the hailstones <S%H1259><s%> than who <S%H834><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> killed <S%H2026><s%> with the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> when Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> delivered up <S%H5414><s%> the Amorites <S%H567><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "Sun, <S%H8121><s%> stand still <S%H1826><s%> on Gibeon! <S%H1391><s%> You, <S%H3394><s%> moon, stop in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Aijalon! <S%H357><s%>"

The sun <S%H8121><s%> stood still, <S%H1826><s%> and the moon <S%H3394><s%> stayed, <S%H5975><s%> until the nation <S%H1471><s%> had avenged <S%H5358><s%> themselves of their enemies. <S%H341><s%> Isn't <S%H1931><s%> this written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of Jashar? <S%H3477><s%> The sun <S%H8121><s%> stayed <S%H5975><s%> in the midst <S%H2677><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and didn't <S%H213><s%> hurry to go down <S%H935><s%> about a whole <S%H8549><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

There was no day <S%H3117><s%> like that before <S%H6440><s%> it or after <S%H310><s%> it, <S%H3068><s%> that Yahweh listened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of a man; <S%H376><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> for Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> returned, <S%H7725><s%> and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him, <S%H4264><s%> to the camp to Gilgal. <S%H1537><s%>
These five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> fled, <S%H5127><s%> and hid <S%H2244><s%> themselves in the cave <S%H4631><s%> at Makkedah. <S%H4719><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> was told, <S%H5046><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "The five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> are found, <S%H4672><s%> hidden <S%H2244><s%> in the cave <S%H4631><s%> at Makkedah. <S%H4719><s%>"

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Roll <S%H1556><s%> large <S%H1419><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> to the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the cave, <S%H4631><s%> and set <S%H6485><s%> men <S%H582><s%> by it to guard them; <S%H8104><s%>

but don't <S%H5975><s%> stay. Pursue <S%H7291><s%> your <S%H310><s%> enemies, <S%H341><s%> and strike them from the rear. <S%H2179><s%> Don't <S%H5414><s%> allow them to enter <S%H935><s%> into their cities; <S%H5892><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into your hand. <S%H3027><s%>"

It happened, <S%H3091><s%> when Joshua and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had finished <S%H3615><s%> killing <S%H5221><s%> them with a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter <S%H4347><s%> until they were consumed, <S%H8552><s%> and the remnant <S%H8300><s%> which remained <S%H8277><s%> of them had entered <S%H935><s%> into the fortified <S%H4013><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%>

that all the people <S%H5971><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to the camp <S%H4264><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> at Makkedah <S%H4719><s%> in peace. <S%H7965><s%> None moved <S%H2782><s%> his tongue <S%H3956><s%> against any <S%H376><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Open <S%H6605><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the cave, <S%H4631><s%> and bring those five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of the cave to me. <S%H4631><s%>"

They did <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H2568><s%> and brought those five kings <S%H4428><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of the cave <S%H4631><s%> to him: <S%H4428><s%> the king of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jarmuth, <S%H3412><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Lachish, <S%H3923><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> of Eglon. <S%H5700><s%>

It happened, <S%H4428><s%> when they brought those kings out <S%H3318><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for all the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to the chiefs <S%H7101><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> who went <S%H1980><s%> with him, <S%H7126><s%> "Come near, put <S%H7760><s%> your feet <S%H7272><s%> on the necks <S%H6677><s%> of these kings. <S%H4428><s%>" They came near, <S%H7126><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> their feet <S%H7272><s%> on their necks. <S%H6677><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H3372><s%> "Don't be afraid, nor be dismayed. <S%H2865><s%> Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and courageous, <S%H553><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> this to all your enemies <S%H341><s%> against whom you fight. <S%H3898><s%>"

Afterward <S%H310><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> them, <S%H4191><s%> put them to death, and hanged <S%H8518><s%> them on five <S%H2568><s%> trees. <S%H6086><s%> They were hanging <S%H8518><s%> on the trees <S%H6086><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

It happened at the time <S%H6256><s%> of the going down <S%H935><s%> of the sun, <S%H8121><s%> that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded, <S%H6680><s%> and they took them down <S%H3381><s%> off the trees, <S%H6086><s%> and cast <S%H7993><s%> them into the cave <S%H4631><s%> in which they had hidden <S%H2244><s%> themselves, <S%H7760><s%> and laid great <S%H1419><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> on the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the cave, <S%H4631><s%> which remain to this very <S%H6106><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> Makkedah <S%H4719><s%> on that day, <S%H3117><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> with its king. <S%H4428><s%> He utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> them and all the souls <S%H5315><s%> who were in it. <S%H7604><s%> He left none remaining. <S%H8300><s%> He did <S%H6213><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Makkedah <S%H4719><s%> as he had done <S%H6213><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> from Makkedah, <S%H4719><s%> and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him, <S%H3841><s%> to Libnah, and fought <S%H3898><s%> against Libnah. <S%H3841><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> it also, <S%H4428><s%> with its king, into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> He struck <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and all the souls <S%H5315><s%> who were in it. <S%H7604><s%> He left none remaining <S%H8300><s%> in it. <S%H6213><s%> He did to its king <S%H4428><s%> as he had done <S%H6213><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> from Libnah, <S%H3841><s%> and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him, <S%H3923><s%> to Lachish, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> against it, <S%H3898><s%> and fought against it.

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> Lachish <S%H3923><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> He took <S%H3920><s%> it on the second <S%H8145><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> with all the souls <S%H5315><s%> who were in it, <S%H6213><s%> according to all that he had done to Libnah. <S%H3841><s%>

Then Horam <S%H2036><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Gezer <S%H1507><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> to help <S%H5826><s%> Lachish; <S%H3923><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> him and his people, <S%H5971><s%> until he had left <S%H7604><s%> him none remaining. <S%H8300><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> from Lachish, <S%H3923><s%> and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him, <S%H5700><s%> to Eglon; and they encamped <S%H2583><s%> against it fought against it. <S%H3898><s%>

They took <S%H3920><s%> it on that day, <S%H3117><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword. <S%H2719><s%> He utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> all the souls <S%H5315><s%> who were in it that day, <S%H3117><s%> according to all that he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Lachish. <S%H3923><s%>
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> from Eglon, <S%H5700><s%> and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him, <S%H2275><s%> to Hebron; and they fought against it. <S%H3898><s%>

They took <S%H3920><s%> it, <S%H5221><s%> and struck it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> with its king <S%H4428><s%> and all its cities, <S%H5892><s%> and all the souls <S%H5315><s%> who were in it. <S%H7604><s%> He left none remaining, <S%H8300><s%> according to all that he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Eglon; <S%H5700><s%> but he utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> it, <S%H5315><s%> and all the souls who were in it.
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> returned, <S%H7725><s%> and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him, <S%H1688><s%> to Debir, and fought against it. <S%H3898><s%>

He took <S%H3920><s%> it, <S%H4428><s%> with its king and all its cities. <S%H5892><s%> They struck <S%H5221><s%> them with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> all the souls <S%H5315><s%> who were in it. <S%H7604><s%> He left none remaining. <S%H8300><s%> As he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> so he did <S%H6213><s%> to Debir, <S%H1688><s%> and to its king; <S%H4428><s%> as he had done <S%H6213><s%> also to Libnah, <S%H3841><s%> and to its king. <S%H4428><s%>

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> all the land, <S%H776><s%> the hill country, <S%H776><s%> and the South, <S%H5045><s%> and the lowland, <S%H8219><s%> and the slopes, <S%H794><s%> and all their kings. <S%H4428><s%> He left <S%H7604><s%> none remaining, <S%H8300><s%> but he utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> all that breathed, <S%H5397><s%> as Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> commanded. <S%H6680><s%>
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> them from Kadesh Barnea <S%H6947><s%> even to Gaza, <S%H5804><s%> and all the country <S%H776><s%> of Goshen, <S%H1657><s%> even to Gibeon. <S%H1391><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> all these kings <S%H4428><s%> and their land <S%H776><s%> at one <S%H259><s%> time, <S%H6471><s%> because Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> for Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> returned, <S%H7725><s%> and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him, <S%H4264><s%> to the camp to Gilgal. <S%H1537><s%>
